Description: Emitted when a git branch or tag is created.
Emitted when commits are pushed to a repository.
Emitted when a git branch or tag is deleted.
Emitted when a wiki page is created or updated.
Emitted when repository collaborators are added or removed.
Emitted when a private repository is made public.
Emitted when a new release is published.
Emitted when comments are made on commits.
Emitted when there is activity on pull requests (opened, closed, merged, or assigned).
Emitted when a pull request review is submitted or updated.
Emitted when comments are added within pull request reviews.
Emitted when there is activity on an issue (opened, closed, labeled, etc.).
Emitted when comments are added or edited on issues.
Emitted when a user stars or watches a repository.
